structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.text: The secretary shall establish the internal organization of the cabinet not otherwise established by the Governor or the General Assembly and shall organize the cabinet into such organizational units as the secretary deems necessary to perform the functions, powers, and duties of the cabinet, subject to the provisions of KRS Chapter 12.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 45, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 10.
